desc: Experience the world of aviation and become immersed in our incredibly real Boeing 737 flight simulator. Alternatively, you can browse our large aviation and aerospace merchandise section, here you can find the latest and coolest aviation models, apparel and more.

layout.text: We are Melbourne's exclusive Boeing 737 immersive flight simulator experience. If you've always dreamed of piloting a jetliner, or being a pilot for a day, our flight simulators are perfect for fun or more professional flying goals. We are open to the public and cater to all ages and skill, with no experience required - our instructors are certified pilots.
